Description: Downloaded Docker, attempted first container build with static binaries. Encountered exec format error due to permissions/auth mismatch.
Outcome: Issue traced to CLI authentication with Docker Hub. Resolved using Personal Access Token.

Description: Rebuilt Docker image with correct architecture and permissions. Verified image operation.
Created Dockerfile, entry script, mounted volumes, and integrated internal logging and caching structures.
Outcome: Container executed successfully and was responsive.

Description: Created and validated scaffold-test.sh and integration-test.py scripts. Verified environment compatibility with mounted volumes and file output.
Outcome: Confirmed system interoperability and baseline functionality for future layers.
